articles.title: Health insurance: How to save hundreds - if not thousands - on your policy
articles.description: If you have been on the same policy for more than three years you are probably overpaying by about 25%
articles.content:

articles.title: WHO warns of dengue risk as global warming pushes cases near historic highs
articles.description: The World Health Organization warned on Friday that cases of dengue fever could reach close to record highs this year, partly due to global warming benefiting mosquitoes that spread it.

articles.title: Industry groups in California vie for new Medicaid money
articles.description: California's powerful health care industry just notched a historic win: The state is going to give it an $11.1 billion infusion to improve care for millions of low-income Medicaid patients.
articles.content:
California's powerful health care industry just notched a historic win: The state is going to give it an $11.1 billion infusion to improve care for millions of low-income Medicaid patients.

articles.title: Volunteering may help stave off mental decline for older Americans
articles.description: Many retirees opt to volunteer as a way to help others, but new research suggests this act can also benefit volunteers' brain health.
